name: Android Based Agriculture Info. Gen. App
short_description: Our project is an android-mobile based application. This project focuses on agriculture sector. It identifies the plants; detect its health status and identifies the disease present if any using image processing and gives necessary advices with the help of leaf-images of the plant that are provided by user. It gives the information of the plant, plant diseases, and pesticides that could be used for its cure. It is client-server architecture in which android supported mobile acts as a client. Server processes the client’s query and relay the related information to the client. The server side is independent of device. The application is installed in android mobile device.
summary: Android Based Agriculture Information Generation Application
